display_long_description:
🎮 Gameplay​
Running: Run in place in order to run in the game

Extra Movement Help: Left Thumbstick (hold it towards the direction you want to go)

Jump: Jump in reality in order to jump in the game

Duck: Duck in reality in order to duck in the game

Activate Laser Katanas: Press the Trigger Buttons (Release to deactivate)

Always Have the Laser Katanas Active: 

Back to the Main Menu: Go backwards when the game starts (will implement an UI menu soon)



Destroying the incoming lasers: hit them hard with the Laser Katanas (they will go through if you don't hit them hard enough)

Destroying the enemies: hit them with the Laser Katanas



Power-ups: 

Green: +Acceleration and +100 Shield Healing

Blue: +Maximum Speed and +200 Shield Healing



Debuffs:

Yellow: temporary slow-down and -Acceleration

Red: temporary slow-down, -Acceleration and -Maximum Speed



Goal: Reach the Highest Score (by destroying enemies and collecting crystals and power-ups)



Losing Condition:

Shield goes below 0



*Notes: 

Do not slow down because there is a ghost drone that hunts you and it will catch up, if it touches you, your shield will go below 0

Make sure you eliminate the drones and shooters because even if you go past them they could shoot you from behind
